risk_triage_config.trigger_condition: At least one CRITICAL severity finding (e.g., Private Keys) is detected by the scan node.
risk_triage_config.internal_logic: Matches severity === 'CRITICAL' in Build Security Report node.

risk_triage_config.trigger_condition: No critical findings detected, but at least one HIGH or MEDIUM severity finding (e.g., API Keys) is present.
risk_triage_config.internal_logic: Matches severity === 'HIGH' || severity === 'MEDIUM' in Build Security Report node.

risk_triage_config.trigger_condition: No new findings identified or only non-credible secrets detected after entropy and example filtering.
risk_triage_config.internal_logic: Matches overallRisk === 'LOW RISK', triggering the 'false' branch of the If node to suppress alerts.
